local_intent: Reacquire block_T if needed and re-align to its face for stable pushing; confirm tool yaw remains at 135°.
assumptions: Robot is already near the block from prior steps
Yaw 135° was set earlier and should be maintained
coherence_with_global: Uses same detection fallback as GLOBAL_BT, performs ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.005 and timeout 1200, and verifies AtOrientation 135 consistent with prior SetTCPYaw; Retry(3) reflects re-align between pushes.
